medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient developed abdominal pain around 12:30 AM after having a regular meal for dinner. The pain started in the central mid-abdomen and radiated upwards and downwards. The intensity of the abdominal pain was somewhat waxing and waning. The patient attempted to relieve the pain with sprite but it did not help. He also felt nauseous and vomited after drinking. He has not experienced fever or chills and continues to pass flatus.
medical_history.family_history: No history of GI disease or cancers, no significant heart disease to his knowledge.
